GetStartedPage.title: Get Started with Chester
GetStartedPage.introText: Welcome to Chester! Follow these steps to get started with your new programming language.
GetStartedPage.step1Title: 1. Install Proto to manage Chester versions
GetStartedPage.step1Description: Proto is a tool that helps you manage different versions of Chester. Install Proto using the following commands based on your operating system:
